spans.text: In terms of makeup skills, Anon really has the confidence to brag.
When Taki opened her eyes again, and her face was reflected in the makeup mirror again, Taki found that her complexion was indeed much better than before.
It's obviously just the simplest light makeup.
Hmph! What did I say!
Don't underestimate me in the future!
Yes, yes, you are the most amazing... Ah--!

Before she could take her eyes off the mirror, she was pulled directly into the live broadcast, and in that somewhat unfamiliar streamer page for Taki, in the comment section on the side, many characters had already popped up, constantly updating upwards, with the comments scrolling within the video interface.

Taki frowned and leaned closer, and surprisingly found that in addition to the usual greetings to the streamer, there were many people asking who she was, and what surprised her even more was that even before Anon had entered the introduction segment, many new messages had already typed out her name.

【wwww It's actually our Taki】【TAKI~~】【Hey, hey, this is the captain and drummer of the streamer's band, are there still newbies who don't know?】【It's actually Taki! I want to see who else says that our rhythm section has a bad relationship!】【The rhythm section has a bad relationship - unless you immediately call the bassist over www】

【Live was super awesome! I got a ticket last time by chance, and the drums really got me going!】【What? Are you guys serious? Anon didn't lie?】【She really has a band?? I always thought she was joking!】【Oh my god, Taki... I have to call my friend over to watch...】

【The people in the front should know it's true if they just watch the guitar practice videos that non posted before www】【Oh my god, non, your band's drummer is such a handsome beauty! You're secretly eating so well behind our backs!】【Why are there so many people all of a sudden? I can't keep up with the comments...】
Of course, among these messy comments related to Taki, the most frequent, the most eye-catching, and the most numerous, was not Taki's name, but - Rikki.

Taki stared blankly at the word that she had once resisted, which had now become part of her external impression, frantically flashing across the screen, and the culprit was reading those messages while gently tapping her leg under the table with her knee.

Not receiving a response from the other party, Anon selected a few messages about Taki and read them out, then turned her head and glanced at the person who had fallen into a daze again, she smiled very happily.
Okay, okay, we've received everyone's enthusiasm - it's all your fault, sending so many strange comments at once, what if you scare our Rikki silly - look, she's already motionless.
Saying that, in order to prove her words, Anon really reached out and poked Taki's side.
Ah! Ah...
That...
Ah what ah, introduction, self-introduction ah.
Ah... Well, hello everyone, my name is Taki Shiina.
I am the drummer of Anon's... of Anon Chihaya's band.
See! I told you you scared her!
How are you going to compensate for scaring my precious drummer and composer silly!
What, is one SC not enough? Is this something that can be measured with SCs?
Please! This is Rikki!
Give me at least 200 top-tier SCs!
Guh...
It was Taki who quietly pinched Anon's lower back.
The comments became lively again.
All of them were MyGO!!!!! fans who had poured in after receiving the news of Taki's appearance, teasing the two of them.
Oh my! There are so many people now - it's all your fault for being so noisy! I haven't even said today's opening remarks yet!
(Anon's live broadcast opening remarks...)
Taki raised her eyes to look at the continuously updating messages on the screen.
Sure enough, she saw many comments that were exactly the same as her thoughts.

【In that case, let's skip this part!】【Don't waste the precious fifteen seconds of my life!】【So non is still not going to change the opening remarks??? Change it, I'm begging you...】【What year is it, why can I still hear an opening that sounds like a talk show from the early 2000s wwwww】
(This live broadcast room really has a lot of good people -)
(Except for those few who were impolite to Tomori before.)
But Anon doesn't care at all.
Anon still insisted on saying that sentence.
Welcome everyone to Anon's tea party for ladies——
(This kind of creamy, light, greasy, and overly sweet tone...)
(As expected, live direct hits are even more frightening...)
How disgusting... Ugh——
Anon kicked Taki hard under the table.
Anyway! Since Rikki is here today, it's rare, so let everyone take a look at the recording of our last Live!

With lightning speed, Anon switched the live broadcast interface to screen sharing, and while using the Live recording to kill time for the audience, she grabbed Taki and turned her back, forcing Taki to stick to her forehead to forehead, whispering to each other.
What's wrong again, my big streamer?
Oh my! There are more and more MyGO fans in the live broadcast room, Rikki, please pay attention to your words!
I didn't say anything dirty, did I? I didn't even say "Huh?"!
Ah~~~~ not~~~~ not that influence——
Then please explain clearly!
Taki broke free from Anon's restraint.
Anon blinked her eyes, her teeth grinding, her face full of resentment.
Anon rubbed her temples, supported her forehead and waved, signaling Taki to get closer.
Rikki...
Do you even know that in this world, besides solo stans and group fans, there is another type of fan called CP fans?
Of course——
Wait, what do you mean?
What I mean is... I actually have quite a lot of CP fans with Rikki...
Although it doesn't seem like that many - but they exist! Do you understand what I mean? Quantity doesn't matter, what matters is that they exist! So be nicer to me!
No, what is it about us two that makes them think we're a good match?
Yes, yes, it's this kind of thing.
...It's really meaningless.

Please, I make a living off of this - what else can a streamer like me earn if I don't do CP marketing? If I don't earn money, I can't save money, and if I can't save money, I can't rent venues and equipment, and if I can't rent good venues and equipment, how will our MyGO be able to -
Enough, enough, enough - stop!
Luckily, I'm not going to die today.
What's wrong?!
If the last thing I do before I die is to play lesbians with you in a live broadcast...
God, I will definitely die with my eyes open.
It's not that outrageous - and what do you mean by playing lesbians! It sounds so awful! We are clearly just having a frank and open friendship!
Hey, wait.
Are you saying you agree? You agreed~~~~
I knew Rikki was the best!!!!
Anon pounced over like an octopus, and Taki held out her arm to block her.
Not again...
Hmph~~ You're so stingy! I've always been trying my best, okay! Do you want to see who's running MyGO's account, who's designing the clothes, who's -
Taki pushed Anon, who was approaching again, away an arm's length.
Okay.
Thank you.
A brief thank you.
Taki didn't dare to look directly into Anon's eyes.
Similarly, she didn't notice that Anon, who was standing still in place, had fallen into a daze similar to her earlier one.
Taki just returned to her seat and quietly began to watch the Live recording that had not yet ended.
After a while, Taki saw out of the corner of her eye that the chair next to her was pulled open.
This time, Anon didn't say much, just sat down silently, like Taki, and looked at the screen.
Looking at each other in the screen.
The Live time was not long, and after the streamer's very mature editing, only the essence was left.
And as the video ended, the fans who poured in filled the screen, almost blocking the upper half of Anon and Taki's faces.
Noticing the tension of the person next to her, Anon patted the back of Taki's hand comfortingly, threw an encouraging look over, and made a few silent lip shapes.
(Don't worry, watch me.)
Oh my god... are there so many people here today?

Wait, do we have this many MyGO fans? The number of people online has even exceeded the number of MyGO account followers - I'm telling you, if you're a MyGO fan, hurry up and go follow MyGO's account! My heart is bleeding every day when I see the number of followers decreasing!

The comments started scrolling madly again, and from time to time, a few red SCs would refresh to the top, and Anon would immediately read out the other party's ID and message, briefly answer, and then express her gratitude.
Taki couldn't help but feel strange and new to this kind of Anon.
Even though Taki usually secretly watches Anon's live broadcasts, she should be more than familiar with this set of processes that has already been engraved on the streamer's skill tree.
What kind of feeling is this?
Taki was unwilling to admit it.
In such a daze, she saw a face gradually magnified in front of her.
Anon?
Anon immediately pointed the mobile camera at Taki.
Look at you! I told you not to scare her! It's over, my precious drummer and composer has really become a du——Ah!
Unable to bear it any longer, Taki knocked Anon on the forehead.
Don't talk nonsense.
Okay... hurry up and look at the messages, there are a lot of questions specifically asking you to answer - answer them well! People paid money!
I know!
Taki turned her head and looked at the screen.
In addition to the countless layers of red SCs at the top, there were more encouragements, praises and questions scrolling below.
Some of the more normal ones asked about the progress of the new song's creation or the time of the next Live, expressing their love or opinions on the band's albums and songs.
Some of the more relaxed ones asked about Taki and Anon's schedule today, their recent lives, or greeted them with good health.
And on the next level, there were some nonsensical member relationship jokes and even more naked confessions.
And Anon, not afraid of making things worse, picked and chose those outrageous sentences to read out.

Oh oh, thank you to this, um, er... the friend named 【I want to be Taki's bass drum】for sending the SC message, um, this friend's message says "Taki I love you I want to marry you", um um okay thank you for your message but marriage is not possible, after all, everyone in our MyGO has agreed to be in the band for a lifetime——
You agree, right, Rikki?
Still stuck in the praise, unable to turn around, and suddenly poked by Anon, Taki nodded, covering her arm.
Yes... yes.

Um um that's right, so the next one... let me see, um, this one, thank you 【Bass Essence Oil】for sending the SC message, this person's message is "You can actually bring Taki to the live broadcast? Did you really steal a panda from the Ueno Zoo? Taki is too spineless."
Hmph, this friend underestimates Anon's charm too much - besides, Rikki has always been very kind to people, hee hee, Rikki, what do you say?
Taki just smiled.
So you really don't want to complain about the previous friend's ID?

You're making a fuss, there was a guy in my live broadcast room before named 【Gigantamaxed Jiggilypuff Used Boomburst】 - oh right, your smile is really uglier than crying - let's look at the next one -

Oh my, why are there so many questions for Rikki again, where are my fans!? Where have you all gone! Don't you have anything to ask me - don't ask me when I'm going to change the opening and video OP - and don't say there are no other questions besides these two!
Under Anon's hosting and guidance, Taki was finally not as nervous as she was at the beginning.
She gradually became able to answer some questions more fluently, and occasionally she could say a few embarrassing things about Anon, so that Anon's fans could also smile knowingly.
...Yes, the team name she came up with was rejected by everyone because it was too tacky, who knew that she still didn't give up and opened a channel with this name later...
Hey, hey, enough with the revelations, don't drive away the few fans I have left.
It doesn't matter, anyway, the band members won't unfollow you.
Oh~~~ the band members~~~~ including Rikki?
I won't unfollow you either.
So no matter what, you'll have four, um, nine... right, those five guys probably won't either...?
Hmph, I only need four.
Yes Yes.
Anon turned her head away with some smugness, and faced the camera again.
Oh, right, so many friends have come to today's live broadcast room, Anon knows that everyone is here because they like me, like Taki, or like the band MyGO and the band's songs.
So Anon would also like to remind everyone who has come to Anon's live broadcast room for the first time~~
Don't specifically follow MyGO because you like watching Anon's live broadcasts, and don't come to watch Anon's live broadcasts because you like MyGO.
Don't accept what you don't like because you like it.
If there are new friends who are interested in MyGO because of today's live broadcast, please go follow MyGO's official account, band information will be released there.
Please everyone love music more purely.
In the corner that the camera couldn't reach, Taki quietly turned her head and looked at Anon's profile.
It seemed that something she had never noticed before was shining.
Perhaps in order to hide her emotions, Anon quickly wiped the corner of her eye and showed a bright business smile as usual.
Of course! You should also like Anon more purely!

Oh my~ I mainly hope that the streamer and the band's careers are separate~ I can't let the band rub off on the heat of my world's number one Anon Tokyo channel for nothing~ Do you know how expensive my advertising fees are now!
The atmosphere became a little different.
Like butter being placed in a warm climate, gradually melting.
Taki suddenly felt that the whole world had become soft, soft and comfortable, with a gentle aroma wrapping around her, and all the feelings that made her feel at ease came from the same direction.
Anon.
Taki earnestly called out this name.
Anon looked in Taki's direction.
That's what you say, but you'll still be frantically refreshing the band account's homepage to count the fans, right?
Oh my! You're such a hateful guy!
I finally said something so cool!

Okay! Just this once - please everyone! Everyone who likes MyGO! Please click to follow our MyGO official account! I know that we've been doing too little business lately, so we've been losing followers, but I promise soon! We'll be back to a stable update soon! Right? Rikki! Say something, Rikki!
Anon tugged at Taki's clothes, seeming to use Taki to guarantee to the audience.
The comments really turned into a prairie of wwwwww.
Infected by the atmosphere of the comments, Taki also laughed.
Is that okay? MyGO's revenue can't afford Anon Tokyo's advertising fees.
Oh my! You're so annoying——
But that's it! Rikki! You have to smile like this to look good!
Taki wiped away the tears that had seeped out of the corners of her eyes.
Is that so.
Yes - oh, the time is almost up! Let me see...
Ah, there's a new SC - okay, this is the last question spot! Friends behind, please don't send any more SC questions!
The last question, thank you to the friend named 【RikkiLove】! This friend's question is...
"When will MyGO have another Live?"
Taki and Anon couldn't help but lean closer to that extremely eye-catching text and...
Taki keenly noticed the avatar used by the other party - it was a slightly comical cartoon trumpet.
Cough cough... asking you, Rikki.
The guy who claims to be the captain of MyGO, why aren't you answering?
Don't be like this at this time——
Anon saw the faint smile on Taki's face that hadn't been withdrawn.
Hmph, I really can't be too nice to you.
I should be the one saying that!
...Regarding the question of when we will have another Live, I have actually started writing new songs, so I think it should be soon.
Very soon. There will be another Live very soon.
Maybe next week?
That's a little too fast - hey!
Taki didn't respond to Anon's retort.
On the contrary, her expression gradually became serious and solemn.
In any case, thank you everyone for your support of me, of MyGO, and of Anon.
Thank you everyone for still being willing to have expectations for MyGO, for having expectations for our Live.
Thank you very much... very much everyone, and Anon for inviting me to live stream together.
Being able to touch the real warmth at this moment.
Thank you.
Taki turned her head to look at Anon, who was smiling as always, waving goodbye to the audience.
Bye bye, bye bye.
Goodbye.
